name: Sayed Ahmad
short_description: Sayed Ahmad is a Bangladeshi singer, writer, lyricist, composer and Islamic scholar. At present he is living in Dhaka, Bangladesh. His home District is at Magura in Bangladesh. He was born in Dhaka in 1990 and grew up there. He is the executive director of Kalarab Shilpigosthi which is familiar as the biggest islamic music band in Bangladesh and that was established by Late Maulana Ainuddin Al Azad (RH). Sayed was inclined to Islamic music from his early childhood and he wished to do something different in this arena. So, he started working for Islamic music when he was only 14 years old. Since then, he has built up himself as a musical artist. After completing study successfully, he started to spread the messages of Islam to the mass people through different conferences held across the country. Besides, he also began writing books.
